00018 PortsModel::PortsModel( void* dataPointer, QObject *parent ):
00019 QAbstractTableModel(parent),
00020 ports_(), table_() {
00021 
00022         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "PortsModel constructor",
00023                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00024 
00025         // set the pointer to the actual data structure containing the 
00026         // model parameters
00027         ports_ = static_cast<QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > *>(dataPointer);
00028 
00029         restore();
00030 }

00051 QVariant PortsModel::data(const QModelIndex& index, int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00052 
00053         if (!index.isValid())
00054                 return QVariant();
00055 
00056         // if row is invalid
00057         if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00058                 return QVariant();
00059 
00060         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00061 
00062                 switch (index.column()) {
00063                         case 0: {
00064                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getName();
00065                                         }
00066                         case 1: {
00067                                 return General::direction2Str(table_.at(index.row())->getDirection());
00068                                         }
00069                         case 2: {
00070                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getPortSize();
00071                                         }
00072                         case 3: {
00073                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getLeftBound();
00074                                         }
00075                         case 4: {
00076                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getRightBound();
00077                                         }
00078                         case 5: {
00079                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName();
00080                                         }
00081                         case 6: {
00082                                 QString typeName = table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName();
00083                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getTypeDefinition(typeName);
00084                                         }
00085                         case 7: {
00086                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getDefaultValue();
00087                                         }
00088                         case 8: {
00089                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getDescription();
00090                                         }
00091                         default: {
00092                                 return QVariant();
00093                                          }
00094                 }
00095         }
00096 
00097         // if unsupported role
00098         else {
00099                 return QVariant();
00100         }
00101 }

00103 QVariant PortsModel::headerData( int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00104                                                                 int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00105 
00106         if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal)
00107                 return QVariant();
00108 
00109         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00110 
00111                 switch (section) {
00112                         case 0: {
00113                                 return tr("Name");
00114                                         }
00115                         case 1: {
00116                                 return tr("Direction");
00117                                         }
00118                         case 2: {
00119                                 return tr("Width");
00120                                         }
00121                         case 3: {
00122                                 return tr("Left\n(higher)\nbound");
00123                                         }
00124                         case 4: {
00125                                 return tr("Right\n(lower)\nbound");
00126                                         }
00127                         case 5: {
00128                                 return tr("Type");
00129                                         }
00130                         case 6: {
00131                                 return tr("Type\ndefinition");
00132                                         }
00133                         case 7: {
00134                                 return tr("Default\nvalue");
00135                                         }
00136                         case 8: {
00137                                 return tr("Description");
00138                                         }
00139                         default: {
00140                                 return QVariant();
00141                                          }
00142                 }
00143         }
00144 
00145         // if unsupported role
00146         else {
00147                 return QVariant();
00148         }
00149 }

00151 bool PortsModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index, 
00152                                                  const QVariant& value, 
00153                                                  int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00154         
00155         if (!index.isValid())
00156                 return false;
00157 
00158         // if row is invalid
00159         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00160                 return false;
00161 
00162         if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00163                 
00164                 switch (index.column()) {
00165                         case 0: {
00166                                 table_.at(index.row())->setName(value.toString());
00167                                 break;
00168                                         }
00169                         case 1: {
00170 
00171                                 General::Direction direction = General::str2Direction(
00172                                         value.toString(), General::DIRECTION_INVALID);
00173                                 
00174                                 table_.at(index.row())->setDirection(direction);
00175                                 break;
00176                                         }
00177                         case 2: {
00178                                 int size = value.toInt();
00179                                 table_.at(index.row())->setPortSize(size);
00180                                 
00181                                 // if port is vectored and previous type was std_logic
00182                                 if (size > 1 && table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName() == QString("std_logic")) {
00183                                         
00184                                         // change the type to vectored
00185                                         table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName("std_logic_vector");
00186                                 }
00187 
00188                                 // if port is not vectored but previous type was std_logic_vector
00189                                 else if (size < 2 && table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName() == QString("std_logic_vector")) {
00190 
00191                                         table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName("std_logic");
00192                                 }
00193 
00194                                 emit dataChanged(index, 
00195                                         QAbstractTableModel::index(index.row(), index.column()+3, QModelIndex()));
00196                                 return true;
00197                                         }
00198                         case 3: {
00199 
00200                                 // make sure left bound doesn't drop below right bound
00201                                 if (value.toInt() < table_.at(index.row())->getRightBound())
00202                                         return false;
00203 
00204                                 // ok so make the change
00205                                 table_.at(index.row())->setLeftBound(value.toInt());
00206 
00207                                 int size = table_.at(index.row())->getPortSize();
00208                                 // if port is vectored and previous type was std_logic
00209                                 if (size > 1 && table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName() == QString("std_logic")) {
00210 
00211                                         // change the type to vectored
00212                                         table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName("std_logic_vector");
00213                                 }
00214 
00215                                 // if port is not vectored but previous type was std_logic_vector
00216                                 else if (size < 2 && table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName() == QString("std_logic_vector")) {
00217 
00218                                         table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName("std_logic");
00219                                 }
00220 
00221                                 emit dataChanged(
00222                                         QAbstractTableModel::index(index.row(), index.column()-1, QModelIndex()),
00223                                         QAbstractTableModel::index(index.row(), index.column()+2, QModelIndex()));
00224 
00225                                 return true;
00226                                         }
00227                         case 4: {
00228 
00229                                 // make sure right bound is not greater than left bound
00230                                 if (value.toInt() > table_.at(index.row())->getLeftBound())
00231                                         return false;
00232 
00233                                 // ok so apply the change
00234                                 table_.at(index.row())->setRightBound(value.toInt());
00235 
00236                                 int size = table_.at(index.row())->getPortSize();
00237                                 // if port is vectored and previous type was std_logic
00238                                 if (size > 1 && table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName() == QString("std_logic")) {
00239 
00240                                         // change the type to vectored
00241                                         table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName("std_logic_vector");
00242                                 }
00243 
00244                                 // if port is not vectored but previous type was std_logic_vector
00245                                 else if (size < 2 && table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName() == QString("std_logic_vector")) {
00246 
00247                                         table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName("std_logic");
00248                                 }
00249 
00250                                 emit dataChanged(
00251                                         QAbstractTableModel::index(index.row(), index.column()+1, QModelIndex()), 
00252                                         QAbstractTableModel::index(index.row(), index.column()-2, QModelIndex()));
00253                                 return true;
00254                                         }
00255                         case 5: {
00256                                 QString typeName = value.toString();
00257                                 table_.at(index.row())->setTypeName(typeName);
00258 
00259                                 // update the type definition for the new type name
00260                                 table_.at(index.row())->setTypeDefinition(typeName,
00261                                         VhdlGeneral::getDefaultVhdlTypeDef(typeName));
00262 
00263                                 emit dataChanged(index,
00264                                         QAbstractTableModel::index(index.row(), index.column()+1, QModelIndex()));
00265                                 return true;
00266                                         }
00267                         case 6: {
00268                                 QString typeName = table_.at(index.row())->getTypeName();
00269                                 table_.at(index.row())->setTypeDefinition(typeName, value.toString());
00270                                 break;
00271                                         }
00272                         case 7: {
00273                                 table_.at(index.row())->setDefaultValue(value.toString());
00274                                 break;
00275                                         }
00276                         case 8: {
00277                                 table_.at(index.row())->setDescription(value.toString());
00278                                 break;
00279                                         }
00280                         default: {
00281                                 return false;
00282                                          }
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00286                 return true;
00287         }
00288 
00289         // unsupported role
00290         else {
00291                 return false;
00292         }
00293 }

00295 Qt::ItemFlags PortsModel::flags( const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00296         
00297         if (!index.isValid())
00298                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00299 
00300         return Qt::ItemIsEditable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;

00303 bool PortsModel::isValid() const {
00304         
00305         // check all ports in the table
00306         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, table_) {
00307 
00308                 // if one is in invalid state
00309                 if (!port->isValid())
00310                         return false;
00311         }
00312 
00313         return true;
00314 }
00315 
00316 void PortsModel::apply() {
00317 
00318         if (!isValid())
00319                 return;
00320 
00321         // remove old ports
00322         ports_->clear();
00323 
00324         // add each port from the table
00325         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00326                 ports_->insert(table_.value(i)->getName(), table_.value(i));
00327         }
00328 }
00329 
00330 void PortsModel::restore() {
00331 
00332         beginResetModel();
00333 
00334         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, *ports_) {
00335 
00336                 QSharedPointer<Port> tablePort(new Port(*port.data()));
00337                 // if theres no specified type for the port
00338                 if (!tablePort->hasType()) {
00339                         tablePort->useDefaultVhdlTypes();
00340                 }
00341                 table_.append(tablePort);
00342         }
00343 
00344         endResetModel();
00345 }
00346 
00347 void PortsModel::onRemoveRow( int row ) {
00348         // if row is invalid
00349         if (row < 0 || row >= table_.size())
00350                 return;
00351 
00352         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00353 
00354         // remove the object from the map
00355         table_.removeAt(row);
00356 
00357         endRemoveRows();
00358 
00359         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00360         emit contentChanged();
00361 }
00362 
00363 void PortsModel::onAddRow() {
00364         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00365 
00366         QSharedPointer<Port> port(new Port());
00367         port->setTypeName("std_logic");
00368         port->setTypeDefinition("std_logic", "IEEE.std_logic_1164.all");
00369         table_.append(port);
00370 
00371         endInsertRows();
00372 
00373         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00374         emit contentChanged();
00375 }

00378 void PortsModel::exportPorts( QFile& file ) {
00379         
00380         // create a stream to write into
00381         QTextStream stream(&file);
00382 
00383         // write the headers to the file
00384         stream << tr("Name") << ";";
00385         stream << tr("Direction") << ";";
00386         stream << tr("Width") << ";";
00387         stream << tr("Left bound") << ";";
00388         stream << tr("Right bound") << ";";
00389         stream << tr("Type") << ";";
00390         stream << tr("Type definition") << ";";
00391         stream << tr("Default value") << ";";
00392         stream << tr("Description");
00393         stream << endl;
00394 
00395         // write each port
00396         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, table_) {
00397 
00398                 stream << port->getName() << ";";
00399                 stream << General::direction2Str(port->getDirection()) << ";";
00400                 stream << port->getPortSize() << ";";
00401                 stream << port->getLeftBound() << ";";
00402                 stream << port->getRightBound() << ";";
00403                 stream << port->getTypeName() << ";";
00404                 stream << port->getTypeDefinition(port->getTypeName()) << ";";
00405                 stream << port->getDefaultValue() << ";";
00406                 stream << port->getDescription();
00407                 stream << endl;
00408         }
00409 }
00410 
00411 void PortsModel::importPorts( QFile& file ) {
00412 
00413         // create a stream to read from
00414         QTextStream stream (&file);
00415 
00416         // read the headers from the file
00417         QString headers = stream.readLine();
00418         QStringList headerList = headers.split(";");
00419 
00420         // if the file is not supported type (not same amount of lines)
00421         if (headerList.count() != 9)
00422                 return;
00423 
00424         beginResetModel();
00425 
00426         table_.clear();
00427         
00428         // read as long as theres stuff left to read
00429         while (!stream.atEnd()) {
00430 
00431                 QString line = stream.readLine();
00432                 QStringList elements = line.split(";");
00433                 
00434                 QString name = elements.value(0);
00435                 General::Direction direction = General::str2Direction(
00436                         elements.value(1), General::DIRECTION_INVALID);
00437                 int width = elements.value(2).toInt();
00438                 int left = elements.value(3).toInt();
00439                 int right = elements.value(4).toInt();
00440                 QString typeName = elements.value(5);
00441                 QString typeDefinition = elements.value(6);
00442                 QString defaultValue = elements.value(7);
00443                 QString description = elements.value(8);
00444 
00445                 if (width != (left - right + 1))
00446                         emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 width does not match port bounds").arg(
00447                         name));
00448 
00449                 table_.append(QSharedPointer<Port>(new Port(name, direction, left, right,
00450                         typeName, typeDefinition, defaultValue, description)));
00451         }
00452         
00453         endResetModel();
00454 }
